00028 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00029 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00030 from PyQt4.uic import *
00031 import ServerConfigurationDialog
00032 from Koo.Common import Common
00033 from Koo.Common import Options
00034 from Koo import Rpc
00035 import re
00036 
00037 (CreationOkDialogUi, CreationOkDialogBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('dbcreateok.ui') )
00038 
00039 class CreationOkDialog( QDialog, CreationOkDialogUi ):
00040         def __init__(self, passwordList, parent=None ):
00041                 QDialog.__init__(self, parent)
00042                 CreationOkDialogUi.__init__(self)
00043                 self.setupUi( self )
00044 
00045                 self.connect( self.pushConnect, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.connectNow )
00046                 self.connect( self.pushLater, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.connectLater )
00047 
00048                 self.textEdit.setPlainText( _('The following users have been installed on your database:\n\n'+ passwordList + '\n\n'+_('You can now connect to the database as an administrator.') ) )
00049                 self.show()
00050 
00051         def connectLater(self):
00052                 self.reject()
00053 
00054         def connectNow(self):
00055                 self.accept()
00056 
00057 (ProgressBarUi, ProgressBarBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('progress.ui') )
00058 
00059 class ProgressBar( QDialog, ProgressBarUi ):
00060         def __init__(self, parent=None ):
00061                 QDialog.__init__(self, parent )
00062                 ProgressBarUi.__init__(self)
00063                 self.setupUi( self )
00064 
00065                 self.setModal( True )
00066                 self.timer = QTimer( self )
00067                 self.connect(self.timer,SIGNAL("timeout()"),self.timeout)
00068                 self.url = ""
00069                 self.databaseName = ""
00070                 self.demoData = ""
00071                 self.language = ""
00072                 self.password = ""
00073                 self.progressBar.setMinimum( 0 )
00074                 self.progressBar.setMaximum( 0 )
00075                 self.show()
00076 
00077         def start(self):
00078                 try:
00079                         self.id = Rpc.database.execute(self.url, 'create', self.password, self.databaseName, self.demoData, self.language)
00080                         self.timer.start( 1000 )
00081                 except Exception, e:
00082                         if e.faultString=='AccessDenied:None':
00083                                 QMessageBox.warning(self,_("Could not create database."), _('Bad database administrator password !'))
00084                         else:
00085                                 QMessageBox.warning(self, _('Error during database creation !'),_("Could not create database."))
00086 
00087         def timeout(self):
00088                 try:
00089                         progress,users = Rpc.database.call(self.url, 'get_progress', self.password, self.id)
00090                 except:
00091                         self.timer.stop()
00092                         QMessageBox.warning(self,_("Error during database creation !"),_("The server crashed during installation.\nWe suggest you to drop this database."))
00093                         self.reject()
00094                         return
00095 
00096                 
00097                 # While progress will be 0.0 we'll keep the moving (undefined) progress bar.
00098                 # once it's different we allow it to progress normally. This is done because
00099                 # currently no intermediate values exist.
00100                 if progress > 0.0:
00101                         self.progressBar.setMaximum( 100 )
00102                         
00103                 if 0.0 < progress < 1.0:
00104                         self.progressBar.setValue(progress * 100)
00105                 elif progress == 1.0:
00106                         self.progressBar.setMaximum( 100 )
00107                         self.progressBar.setValue(100)
00108                         self.timer.stop()
00109                         pwdlst = '\n'.join(['    - %s: %s / %s' % (x['name'],x['login'],x['password']) for x in users])
00110                         dialog = CreationOkDialog( pwdlst, self )
00111                         r = dialog.exec_()
00112                         # Propagate the result of the dialog. If the user wants to connect return
00113                         # Accepted, otherwise return Rejected
00114                         self.done( r )
00115 
00116 (DatabaseCreationDialogUi, DatabaseCreationDialogBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('create_database.ui') )
00117 
00118 ## @brief The DatabaseCreationDialog class shows a dialog to create a new database 
00119 # in the OpenERP server.
00120 class DatabaseCreationDialog( QDialog, DatabaseCreationDialogUi ):
00121         def __init__(self, parent=None ):
00122                 QDialog.__init__(self, parent)
00123                 DatabaseCreationDialogUi.__init__(self)
00124                 self.setupUi( self )
00125 
00126                 self.connect(self.pushCancel,SIGNAL("clicked()"),self.slotCancel )
00127                 self.connect(self.pushAccept,SIGNAL("clicked()"),self.slotAccept )
00128                 self.connect(self.pushChange,SIGNAL("clicked()"),self.slotChange )
00129 
00130                 url = '%s%s:%s' % (Options.options['login.protocol'], Options.options['login.server'], Options.options['login.port'])
00131                 self.uiServer.setText(url)
00132                 self.refreshLangList(url) 
00133         
00134         def refreshLangList(self, url):
00135                 self.uiLanguage.clear()
00136                 try:
00137                         lang_list = Rpc.database.call(url, 'list_lang')
00138                 except:
00139                         self.setDialogEnabled( False )
00140                         return
00141                 lang_list.append( ('en_US','English') )
00142                 for key,val in lang_list:
00143                         self.uiLanguage.addItem( val, QVariant( key ) )
00144                 self.uiLanguage.setCurrentIndex( self.uiLanguage.count() - 1 )
00145                 self.setDialogEnabled( True )
00146 
00147         def setDialogEnabled(self, value):
00148                 if not value:
00149                         self.uiMessage.show()
00150                 else:
00151                         self.uiMessage.hide()
00152                 self.uiPassword.setEnabled( value )
00153                 self.uiDatabase.setEnabled( value )
00154                 self.uiDemoData.setEnabled( value )
00155                 self.uiLanguage.setEnabled( value )
00156                 self.pushAccept.setEnabled( value )
00157 
00158         def slotCancel(self):
00159                 self.close()
00160         
00161         def slotAccept(self):
00162                 databaseName = unicode( self.uiDatabase.text() )
00163                 if ((not databaseName) or (not re.match('^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]+$', databaseName))):
00164                         QMessageBox.warning( self, _('Bad database name !'), _('The database name must contain only normal characters or "_".\nYou must avoid all accents, space or special characters.') )
00165                 demoData = self.uiDemoData.isChecked()
00166 
00167                 langreal = unicode( self.uiLanguage.itemData( self.uiLanguage.currentIndex() ).toString() )
00168                 passwd = unicode( self.uiPassword.text() )
00169                 url = unicode( self.uiServer.text() )
00170 
00171                 progress = ProgressBar( self )
00172                 progress.url = url
00173                 progress.databaseName = databaseName
00174                 progress.demoData = demoData
00175                 progress.language = langreal 
00176                 progress.password = passwd 
00177                 progress.start()
00178                 r = progress.exec_()
00179 
00180                 if r == QDialog.Accepted:
00181                         m = QUrl( url )
00182                         m.setUserName( 'admin' )
00183                         m.setPassword( 'admin' )
00184                         self.url = unicode( m.toString() )
00185                         self.databaseName = databaseName
00186                 self.done( r )
00187 
00188         def slotChange(self):
00189                 dialog = ServerConfigurationDialog.ServerConfigurationDialog( self )
00190                 dialog.setDefault( str( self.uiServer.text() ) )
00191                 ret = dialog.exec_()
00192                 if ret == QDialog.Accepted:
00193                         url = dialog.url
00194                         self.uiServer.setText( url )
00195                         self.refreshLangList(url)
